entries.name: Desert Terrain Familiarity
entries: You gain advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks in desert terrain and are not slowed by desert difficult terrain.

entries.name: Explorer's Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws and skill checks to resist environmental hazards while traveling in desert or ruins.

entries.name: Extra Feat
entries: You have the Dungeon Delver feat or its mechanical equivalent as allowed by the DM.
